column4: Hey guys, I don't like to randomly come to places and put URLs, but this is a counter to prove that at least 1% of end users are GNU/Linux users, to disprove a statement claiming that not even 1% of end users were GNU/Linux users: http://www.dudalibre.com/gnulinuxcounter?lang=en
If you could sign up, yesterday it was at 68 when I signed up now its at 300+
